msbt.message: At last! The Fishing Tourney begins today!
Let's give it everything we've got at the Fishing Tourney today!
The Fishing Tourney gets underway at 9:00 AM today, I believe. Let's get ready to fish our little hearts out!
The Tourney has finally started. I really must get serious!
I just love the Fishing Tourney. It has this wonderful way of bringing everyone together. Each and every one of us understands the joy of fishing, after all!
How is the Fishing Tourney treating you so far?I confess, it's not going so swimmingly for me. But surely things will look up soon, my dear!
I'm so glad I competed in the Fishing Tourney today, aren't you? We really must do it again soon, my dear.
I haven't put that much effort into fishing in a long time. My shoulders are so stiff! Let's just relax for the rest of the day. We earned it!
Good work doing all that fishing, . You made it look easy.I, for one, am exhausted! I really must get my beauty rest.
Big fishlittle fishoh how I wish I'd catch a fish Oh! I'm terribly sorry, . I was just singing a little song about the fish I have yet to catch. Perhaps a little song will lure them in.
Would you believe I was THIS close to catching the biggest fish I've ever seen? Alas, it got away at the very last moment!I have no idea how it eluded my lure. Its escape was very FISHY indeed. Haha!
Don't you just love it when you feel your fishing rod shake and you know you've hooked a fish? I'm hooked on that feeling myself, .
I wish I could swim as gracefully as a fishOooh, and as long as I'm making wishesI wish I could breathe under water like a fish too, !

I don't mean to brag, but what fish could possibly resist the lure of my charms? See what I did there, ? The LURE of my charms?Oh, don't mind me. I get so excited about the Fishing Tourney I can't help but act like a silly !

You know, it's good luck to dress up while fishing. It draws the fish right to you during the Fishing Tourney!What? You've never heard of that? You don't say.Well, if I did make it up, it was only because I LOVE to see everyone get all dressed up, .
I wasn't so sure a Fishing Tourney during this season was a good idea But you know, it's been quite lovely! Though truly, , just about everything is lovely when you're around.

Thank goodness the weather is pleasant for today's Fishing Tourney!When it's too hot, my makeup runs. And when it's too cold, my nose runs! But today my makeup and my nose will stay right where they belong while I focus on fishing!

You came out for the Fishing Tourney even in this chilly weather? Aren't you hearty, . I suppose I mustn't let myself be shown up. If you can fish in the cold, then so can I, ! Let's just make sure we don't freeze while casting our lines. The fish mustn't get the last laugh, darling.
Spring weather is just right for a Fishing Tourney, don't you think? Not too hot, not too cold. I wonder if the fish know what a perfect time it is for us to catch them? Let's find out, shall we?

My, my, my! What a pleasure it is to see you at the Fishing Tourney, . Of course, I don't know whether to ask you for fishing tipsor for tips on beating the summer heat. Both are very much on my mind right now, .

Getting out and about for the Fishing Tourney today, are you?I, for one, ADORE being outdoors during the fall. The sky looks biggerthe air feels fresher And my cheeks look rosier too! I mean, I'm sure you noticed, darling. I practically glow this time of year!

My, my, my! What a pleasure it is to see you at the Fishing Tourney, . Of course, I don't know whether to ask you for fishing tipsor for tips on beating the summer heat. Both are very much on my mind right now, .

Getting out and about for the Fishing Tourney today, are you?I, for one, ADORE being outdoors during the fall. The sky looks biggerthe air feels fresher And my cheeks look rosier too! I mean, I'm sure you noticed, darling. I practically glow this time of year!
